message.EN: Thank you for always making my day more enjoyable and bringing me fun and positive energy.

Dear Rei-chan, Though now I am not able to watch most of your streams, I always have you in my mind. I hope you have a great birthday, I wish you happiness and health, and I can't wait to see what the future have in store for you. I may not be able to watch your streams anymore, but I am always on your side. A big hug from Italy

Rei-Chan, congratulations on 3rd year!! I'm glad I found you, you'd opened my eyes again on Vtubers I've been watching Vtubers for the past 4 years and I can say you're drive and motivation is what I love the most about you and also everytime I see you be it a stream or just a short video, I seriously feel at ease. Everytime I feel down, or even forget what I really wanted to do your video sometimes pop up at the 1st slot everytime I open YouTube!! I'm getting emotional now, Rei-chan!!! I love you!! And let's go through this journey together!! "I'm just a traveller, I wanna see the world. More importantly, I wanna see Rei-chan Shine!!!" Thank you for not giving up!! Before I forget I love your Voice acting video!! Reichan sometimes is scary and also cute!! And also someday I will be there also be next to you also as a fellow Vtuber!! Let's make this dream come true!! ğŸ’™ğŸ’•ğŸ²ğŸ®

message.EN: Happy 3rd anniversary Rei! Don't give up on your dream, we love you!

Hello! Happy Anniversary and hello from the USA! I'm no good as an artist so a message is all I can send. I've loved every moment I have seen in your streams and while I'm not able to catch many of them live due to my job I watch as many as I can when I'm not working. In the time I have been a member of the Vtuber community there has never been anyone I've enjoyed watching more than you. Your positivity and strength has been a warm light in darker times and I'm very happy to be a member of this community you have cultivated. While you may not see me often in chat know that I am always cheering for you in any and every way I can. 

Fight on! 

-Dakor122

Howdy Rei! I'm so happy to be around watching you grow and I'm absolutely excited to keep seeing you grow. You're the hardest worker I know and I'm so proud. Keep aiming skyward because no matter what I'll be here to cheer for you
What is one of your favorite games to come back to?
Congratulations on your third anniversary! Watching your streams always brings a smile to my face, and I am very happy that I managed to find you.

Though I have not watched you much recently, I will never forget your fun streams. Your perseverance is awe-inspiring and no matter what life throws at you, you push further and harder. I have nothing but the utmost respect and love for you Rei. Continue to become the best you can.

Happy Youtube anniversary Rei!! Your amazing personality and extremely positive energy is something that is very rare these days. I wish you nothing but the absolute best and may you achieve all your goals. Much love from Malaysia and KEEP FIGHTING AND PUSHING ON!! YOU ARE THE BEST!!

When I first discovered Rei, it was shortly after she revealed her health condition and why she wanted to pursue Vtubing. At the time, I wasn't sure how I could help, and was frustrated. After some time thinking about it, I decided I was going better my own life so I could be in that position to help others, even slightly. Since then, i have started learning Japanese and I have  met some amazing people along the way, and I'm in a better situation that I can happily support Rei through memberships, while also giving advice on early projects and videos. Thank you Rei, for everything you've done and keep doing ğŸ™ â¤
love you rei

Happy anniversary, Rei! Congratulations on your channel growth, you have worked very hard to build a fan base of viewers who truly care about you, and want to see your happiness. Iâ€™m very proud to be a Reiyan!! You were the first independent Vtuber I watched. As of today, YouTube says I have been a Reiyan for 11 months. For 11 months you have inspired me to work hard every day, and to keep smiling even when things are difficult! I look forward to how many new Reiyan will be here next year.
Thank you very much for everything you're doing for us ! I Hope you a lot of great things now and in the future and that you will be here to give us a good time for a long time !

Rei-chan, Iâ€™ve seen your amazing growth up to now and it has made me so immensely proud. When I first saw the video that sheep-san kindly translated, I thought you were an amazing person. I will try my best to continue to support you and I hope you have an amazing 3rd anniversary.

Happy anniversary! I have not been around for you for that long but I have enjoyed it all the same. All of us will support you further from now on and we look forward to anything you plan to do as well! Thank you!

I feel very happy and sane when I see your videos, whenever I have I spend my free time I'll spend them watching your videos. I've been watching for months now, and I can say that I'm glad to have met your channel.
Congratulations on this special day and many wishes for more great days ahead.

at first, i saw your channel because of a ringfit stream and thought it's just another vtuber, but as days go by i got to know your situations and it made me want to watch more and even though it's only been 5months for me, Thank you for everything and Congratulations for your 3rd year!!! we hope you continue uploading videos and livestreaming!
Happy 3rd anniversary Rei-chan !! thank you so much for being here with us and make us smile, Love U!!

I'am not good with words but, Thanks for everything Rei you always make my days brighter, I hope nothing but the best for the following years :) oh and i made a little pixel art, its the best that i can do but i hope you like it :D
Congratulations on 3 years Rei!!! Hope for many more years to come, will continue to support you every step of the way!!
Thank you for all of the fun times.
Hello Rei!!!!!!!! I hope you have a wonderful anniversery i wont be there cause i work way to much but ill be sure to watch the vods, im Glad i found this channel and ill be sure to stay.
Hello Rei ! I hope you are doing great :) I wish you a wonderful year and a happy anniversary !
Omedeto Rei!!! Congratulations for your 3 years on youtube! Please keep bringing us fun videos and streams and stay as cheerful and sweet as always, GanbaRei <3

Happy Anniversary! I hope you have had a great year! I found your channel in March and I am glad that I stayed. I loved seeing you play different games and do different things like your shorts, voice acting and even cooking! I always found you entertaining and funny and very dedicated tow hat you do to interact with us. I love yur streams and I try to be as active as I can. My favorite stream by far is your Doki Doki! I hope you continue to grow! And I will continue to support you!
Happy 3rd Year Anniversary Rei-san! I hope you do well and stay healthy! Keep up the good work, more anniversaries to come!
congrats on your 3rd years, thank you for all this years and hope you all the best for the future and make more good memories with you.
Congrats on 3 years, hope to see you continue to grow and succeed!
Thank you for 3 amazing years of deliveries, Rei-chan! I look forward to your continued growth as a VTuber. Goals are important, but more important is to never give up! We're all cheering for you!

Yo Okami desu Okami Kuro desu,how are you?, i hope mama like my fanart, my first impresion to you is talented and also cute, youre doing well, very well,i also enjoy your stream even though i rarely come,there is too much i wanna to say but if i shorted it just "thanks and take care" also "è¨˜å¿µæ—¥ãŠã‚ã§ã¨ã†!!!"
Congratulation on 3 years of blessing people with your streams! hope you have a great day!

Hello, Rei-chan! I hope you're doing well!
Congratulations on your third anniversary on YouTube!
Since I know you, I want to see you grow bigger and bigger, and I hope you will reach more than a hundread thousand (100.000) subscriber!
Sorry if I rarely have time to watch you but please remember that I keep supporting you behind the scene.
Give my love to your family too <3

From your fan, Alphecca

Hi Rei, congrats on your 3rd anniversary, and your new 2D model debut! Iâ€™m really glad to have found you and as someone who also has a family member with several health problems, I understand the pain it is to move around. I hope you and your family continue living their best lives and hereâ€™s to another year for the Reiyans!

Congratulations on your 3rd anniversary Rei!!! 

You are a great person and I wish that many good things come in your way. You have given content for us Reiyans to enjoy.  I love your perseverance in giving us something that we can all enjoy. Even though you have a hard time speaking and reading english you still try your best to understand and speak to us. Thank you for this because even though I can't understand Japanese, you still try to communicate to us. I love your bubbly personality and energy that you bring to your streams, It is always fun whenever I watch your streams. I am happy that I found your channel and I want to keep supporting you! I haven't been able to watch your streams recently because I've been busy but I still try to watch you from time to time. 

Thank you Rei, for being an amazing person and for staying strong. Thank you for being someone I can look up to.Thank you for bringing me smiles and joy in my darkest days. You have given me happiness and I wish you the very very best!! Big è‰!! (*Ë˜ï¸¶Ë˜*).ï½¡*â™¡(â‰§â–½â‰¦)

Dear Rei chan,
Congratulations for your 3rd year anniversary!!!  Look at how much you have grown...still remember those days when i get to know you from reddit and through clips. Continue to stay     humble this way and do take breaks from time to time... Will always be supporting!!!
ï½DY Haku

message.EN: Hello Rei, happy 3rd year anniversary! I wish you the very best in life, and I am very excited for any upcoming projects you have. Well then, let's make this year a good one shall we?

Hi Rei, 

congratulations on your 3rd anniversary. I am proud be part of your community 
and to be able to see you grow. It has been 8 months since I found you. I really
enjoyed the time spent with you in your streams and I look forward to what the 
future awaits. 

You are an amazing, hardworking, sweet, stubborn (lol) and energetic angel. 
Keep up your energy and positive thinking. I wish that everything you desire
will come true, that you stay healthy and that you will be blessed with 
everything good in this world. I will support you no matter what. 

RareCandyGuy

message.EN:
Congratulation on your 3rd anniversary, Rei!
Thank you very much for the fun,smile and energy you bring all the time, I will keep supporting you and wish you all the success.

All I can say is congratulation on your 3rd year of being in YouTube hopefully you will stride even more success and continue on with making more content, underrated or overrated it doesn't matter to me or anyone else because we'll continue on supporting you and be there for you. I know I might not be the one to say this but I think you need to know that even a single video can motivate someone to continue on living, as for me being one of them being alone in the hospital felt like dying and it scares me so much, but your video's gave me a chance, you even shattered my fear away, and I would always be waiting for your stream even though I talk less but I'm always there. I felt like my usual and cheerful self like it was childhood. Though this felt a little funny to write this but it is what it is. Thank you 
Oh yeah I'm already discharged guess I'm not dying yet and this is a few drawings of you I made in medieval version.

Happy 3rd Anniversary, Rei!
\>U</

I hope you an even brighter future and bigger success on your career~
Let's play again sometimes too!
Hope we get along from here on as well~
n0n/

I also drew something for you, hope you like it~
Happy 3rd anniversary Rei-chan! Im so happy I found you and I will always support you!! Rei-chan #1 á•¦(à¹‘ËƒÌµá´—Ë‚Ìµ)á•¤

Hello Rei! Today is a great day for everyone because we are celebrating your 3rd year in youtube! Your Smile is very warm and welcoming and your happiness is our happiness! We wish you only the best for the future and although there will be many hardships to come we believe that you will surpass everything! Us Reiyans will continue to support your dream and continue to walk to the future with you. Never Give up and keep on smiling!

Happy 3rd year anniversary Rei ^.^~â™ª. I am very happy for knowing you and watching your stream. I am admired and motivated by your effort on doing as a Vtuber. i will continue to support you, and there will be more and more anniversary inthe future. this is the picture i try to draw for you(sorry if it is a little different, and it is no colour..... X_O). Happy Anniversary ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼â™ªï¼¼(*ï¼¾â–½ï¼¾*)ï¼ï¼¼(*ï¼¾â–½ï¼¾*)ï¼â™ª

I just knew Rei-chan recently through some clippers' community posts, but I'm so touched looking at Rei-chan's effort and all your hardwork in bringing fun, entertainment, happiness and positivity to all the listeners, responding to almost all the chats, literally no one feel leftout in the chat. Late to the party, but never be late to have fun isn't it? Congratulations on your 3rd anniversary Rei-chan! And also congratulations in finally being able to debut with the new avatar! Knowing the reasons of you adding the wings to the avatar really brings me tears, keep up the good work but please do remember to take good care of your body, I believe no one wants to see you to be sad nor fall sick. Will keep supporting you! Let's be happy and strong together!

å¿œæ´ã—ã¾ã™!
ä¸€ç·’ã«é ‘å¼µã‚Šã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†!
Rei-san, thanks so much for always brightening up our day with smiles and cheer.  Your streams always bring a smile to my face.  Thanks for everything you do!
Happy anniversary Rei!!! Thank you for all of the energy every stream and I hope your channel will grow bigger and while keep blessing us with your wonderful voice acting.

Congratulations for your 3rd year anniversary, Rei!! I wish you a success in everything that you do. Your voice, your dedication, and your cheerfulness are what make us happy, and I hope we being here makes you enjoy in what you do as well. Again, Omedetouu!!
Congrats on your 3rd year wooohooo

Although I haven't known you for long, you very quickly captured my heart and become one of my most favorite people ever. I'm sorry I haven't been able to hang around lately, life happens and whatnot. But I want to be there for you and with you as long as I can, it's very fun being a part of and watching your deliveries. Thank you for all your hard work and I look forward to what you bring next, Rei-chan.

Hello Rei! How are you today? When I first stumbled upon your YouTube channel, your laughs and energetic personality are what made me stick around for even longer. Whenever I get the time to watch your live stream it would always brighten up my day even more. Despite the hardships that may come your way in the future, I hope you have a amazing and enjoyable life.

Congratulations! Rei-san for your 3rd Anniversary, its a wonderful achievement especially how far you have gone, from First Gen to soon 7th Gen Rei-san. Its all a testament of your Resiliency, your hard work, effort, desire to improve and grow and continue to go past those possible limitations one could have, as well as love for what you enjoy doing and for all of those who support and cheer for you. Even though I came late will like to continue being here to support and cheer for you in this wonderful journey you are in. One thing I would like to say is it was a pleasure seeing both Rei-san together this past Super Bomberman stream 1st Gen and 6th Gen Rei-san it was so much cuteness, endearing and wholesomeness in one stream, made me go back to see your evolving form, and I would say they definitely represent your cheerfulness, upbeat and positive personality as well as your adorable side.
Thank you Rei-san, hope and wish you a Wonderful Anniversary Celebration stream which may continue to lead you to achieve many more goals.â˜ºï¸ğŸ˜ŠğŸ¥³ğŸ¥³

It's been a while. 
Congratulations on three years!
Thank you for entertaining us for so long!
I really enjoy what you do!
Let's look forward to another year together!
I've been very busy with school recently so I didn't have time to come watch ï¼ˆï¼›ã¸ï¼šï¼‰
But don't worry, I won't forget about you!
Feel free to reach out if you ever need help!

Hello Rei-chan. It's been just half a year since I got to know you, but I've really enjoyed watching your content and playing games together with you. You really do bring us smiles and positive energy! 
You're an amazing person, and I'm happy to be part of your community. I hope you'll continue to reach your goals and make your journey a joyful one. After all, a happy Rei is the best Rei!
Happy anniversary!! \(áµ”áµ•áµ”)
Congratulations! Thank you for all the fun streams and happy energy.

Congratulations on your 3rd Year Anniversary!!!! 
Although I found out about you only 1 year ago, it was one of the best things that happend to me then.
Every stream I watched made me smile and brighten my day.
I think you are one of the best vtubers out there and Im sure you will reach all your goals.
Your dedication is really inspiring, every time you trying to do something for us, its melting my heart, you are so cute and wholesome.
I wish I could help you somehow to achieve your dreams, but I only can support.
Thank you for everything you are doing
You are amazing <3
